title: Gift of the Evenstar (3R19)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot Arwen. Bearer must be Aragorn. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn or discard 2 cards from hand to make a minion skirmishing Aragorn strength -1.
Lore:	”'It is mine to give to whom I will… like my heart.'”
Rarity:	R
